title: No Blue Essence
body: i win game with 0 blue essence

replies.body:
They're just greedy and wanted people to be more reliant on riot points. You can pay a small amount of riot points... or 6300 be for something like a new rune page... 

I'm on a low level account and I can't get any new champions. When I hit 12 I got 400 blue essence.... what am I supposed to do with 400 blue essence or a really bad champ shard once every 4 days? Riot is just greedy, there's no other logic that you could throw behind this nonsensical transfer. 

Also, before this patch was released, they started a "rune sale" so that new players would get rid of all of their old IP points trying to get runes. You thought Riot was being nice, but they were actually just still being greedy and trying to get you to waste IP so you got lower BE with the conversion. Can't let people get fun, new champions without paying $10 on a (kind of low quality) game. Notice how there are a bunch of crappy features on the launcher, plenty of issues in game, etc., but all riot is concerned about it raking in money from people who want new champs, new skins, or more rune pages. 

Another noteworthy greedy point for Riot, with mastery pages you could build up to or over 20 (i believe); good thing they got rid of that too so that you were more likely to pay for rune pages. 

TL;DR, Riot is s*i*, and this game would be infinitely better if they sold it to Blizzard/Battle.net or some other company.

Post game rewards currently grant XP and not BE, but there are[ discussions in this thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/pt/c/developer-corner/Jh3Mtzu6-blue-essence-earn-rates-learning-the-numbers-with-carl-and-henrietta) that may change that in the future.  You can find BE through honor, master, and leveling though.

are you sure i can find blue essence through leveling because i just hit 36 and got a warwick shard and amu shard, which is some pretty crappy scaling. when i delete 4 rows of champion shards to get a single champion unlock *zoe* something is wrong with the game. if it was influence points i would have her unlocked. i can't even re roll champ shards to get her now. blue essence is made to screw the player base!

You guys should be ashamed of yourselves this new system is a cancerous grind-fest designed only to nudge players who don't have every champ unlocked and have accumulated 10's of thousands of ip to unlock champs with rp. People aren't stupid it is so obvious, the first few levels went relatively quickly but after though it was a slow grind-fest and I've gotten so many duplicates(which is hilarious given that I own like 30 out of more than 100 champs, fuck you for that riot) AND it was duplicates that disenchanted for a pathetic amount because mostly who i own are from the cheapest brackets of champions. As a new player I'm really disappointed with the recent changes to blue essence. Since I played him on free to play when I started this summer I've been saving up for Jhin, now I feel I will never reach him. New system is very discouraging and makes me less likely to play League.

Ive been playing this game for over 5 years and i am about ready to delete it for good due to the fact the we used to get something for winning or losing and now we only get 50 BE  1 time per day or have to grind play when and if you have a quest that gives BE. 5 years and 115 characters 4 rune pages i played my ass off for and now its been a few months and i cant even get 1 character after playing about 100 games. this is B.S. you guys want money for people to play? i get that but to not give new players a chance to earn their way in this game. you are losing players and the opportunity to make more $.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}  giving BE even in small amounts will increase your players and make them happy to play again. 25 to 70 BE per game based one win/lose and KDA should bring more people in. if it takes a person 3 months to get a 4800 BE champ no one is going to want to play or spend their hard earned money on this game. i like this game but think the change was bad for players who play.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

A small amount of Blue Essence should be awarded for even playing a game. say 5 for a loss and 15 for a win or something like that. It's really frustrating not gaining currency in game and only getting 50 a day (if I even have time to play). Or if you, Riot, believe so strongly in this new system, make the rewards for mastery, honor and leveling more so. I really like the idea of getting chunky amounts of essence for being honored, this would greatly incentivize players to engage teammates/enemies in a collaborative, understanding and civil manner. 

Thoughts??

I'm very disappointed with the BE, people say there are studies comparing incomes with IP and BE stating the second gives you more. For my experience i can say in 30 levels i hardly managed to buy Caitlyn and Varus. 2 holy damn champs in 30 lvls and God knows how much time spent on this game. It is frustrating. I really hope Riot will change this sistem. Let's say you get 1 lvl by playing 10 games (even though they'd be much more) and you used to get an average 100 IP for 1 game (even though they'd be much more): it used to be 1000 IP for 10 games. Now you get 500 BE for 1 lvl, so now you have 50% less purchasing power.
I guess Riot had imagined people would have got angry with this non-rewarding sistem
